abstract: Ben Brantley reviews production of David Henry Hwang play Chinglish, directed by Leigh Silverman and starring Gary Wilmes and Jennifer Lim at the Longacre Theater.
snippet: In David Henry Hwang’s “Chinglish,” now on Broadway, an American businessman hoping to make his fortune in China goes through a maze of cultural confusion and linguistic blunders.
lead_paragraph: In David Henry Hwang’s “Chinglish,” now on Broadway, an American businessman hoping to make his fortune in China goes through a maze of cultural confusion and linguistic blunders.
